title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - From Lab to Market - AstraZeneca's Enterprise-Wide AI Success Story (IND214)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 从实验室到市场 - 阿斯利康的企业级AI成功案例 (IND214)
abstract: AstraZeneca is on a mission to deliver 20 life-changing medicines by 2030, and is leveraging agentic AI technology to make it happen. The company has implemented AI solutions throughout their organization, revolutionizing their data management and analysis capabilities. Through their innovative approach of using modular, multi-agent AI systems, AstraZeneca has deployed multiple AI tools into production across multiple business units. During this presentation, we'll dive into how the company is implementing AI solutions in both their clinical development and commercial divisions to achieve tangible outcomes. Additionally, we'll explore how AstraZeneca is utilizing AWS technologies to create a scalable infrastructure that can readily incorporate future technological advancements.
abstract_cn: 阿斯利康致力于在2030年前交付20种改变生命的药物，并正在利用代理AI技术来实现这一目标。该公司已在整个组织中实施AI解决方案，彻底改变了其数据管理和分析能力。通过使用模块化、多代理AI系统的创新方法，阿斯利康已在多个业务部门将多个AI工具部署到生产环境中。在本次演讲中，我们将深入探讨该公司如何在临床开发和商业部门实施AI解决方案以实现切实成果。此外，我们还将探讨阿斯利康如何利用AWS技术创建可扩展的基础设施，以便轻松整合未来的技术进步。

presenter.name: Ujjwal Ratan
presenter.title: Leader, Data Science and Machine Learning, Healthcare and Life Sciences
